title: Football: Antonio Conte reveals exactly what he shouted at Diego Costa
text:
By Game Yetu Monday, February 6th 2017 at 23:01 Costa was told to train away from the rest of the squad for three days after the row 
Chelsea Boss Antonio Conte has admitted he lost his temper with Diego Costa, but insists his relationship with the Brazil-born forward is now ‘perfect’. 
Costa threw a tantrum last month after major row with the Chelsea manager over fitness resulting in the star striker being dropped. 
'I was very clear with him,' Conte told Sky Italia . 'I raised my voice and the player understood. Now everything is perfect.' 
Costa received an offer worth £30million-a-year net at the start of January from a Chinese club that would have made him one of the highest-paid players in the world.
